Atlanta.Edgewood, Atlanta:
Edgewood is a neighborhood located on the east side of Atlanta, Georgia, United States, located approximately three miles (5km) east of downtown Atlanta.


== History ==
Edgewood was originally its own town, prior to the city's 1909 annexation across the county line from Fulton into DeKalb. Edgewood was developed during Atlanta’s Reconstruction-era economic boom that lasted from 1870 to 1910.
